item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>I got 124 as well - Fi & I are obviously well suited to each other!!</p>
item.content:encoded: I got 124 as well – Fi & I are obviously well suited to each other!!

item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Gutted Matthew, just did the IQ and got only 124, hope you are now feeling particularly superior! Apparently I'm an inspired inventor!!</p>
item.content:encoded: Gutted Matthew, just did the IQ and got only 124, hope you are now feeling particularly superior! Apparently I’m an inspired inventor!!

item.title: By: Mum

item.description: <p>Clever clogs!! it's the genetic makeup that does it???</p>
item.content:encoded: Clever clogs!! it’s the genetic makeup that does it???
